snippet: The European Union agreed this year to phase out the use of “Darjeeling” on blended teas, making tea growers in the real Darjeeling happy.
abstract: Darjeeling Journal; European Union agrees to phase out use of blended teas that call themselves Darjeeling, giving legal protection for label under laws that limit use of certain geographic names to products that come from those places; tea growers in Darjeeling, India, felt their business was threatened by such blends.
lead_paragraph: The European Union agreed this year to phase out the use of “Darjeeling” on blended teas, making tea growers in the real Darjeeling happy.

headline.seo: Darjeeling Tea Growers Get Protection From E.U.
headline.main: Good Name Is Restored in Terrain Known for Tea
headline.print_headline: Good Name Is Restored In Terrain Known for Tea
